game.shortDescription: 인류여, 운명에 맞서라. 서기 2020년. 돌연 습격해온 외계 생명체와 '전지구방위군' EDF의 전투를 그린 액션 슈팅. 당신은 EDF의 병사가 되어 무수히 덤벼드는 거대한 적을 섬멸하고 지구의 평화를 지켜라.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Stand and fight for humanity. This arcade shooter takes place in the year 2022, as the Earth Defense Force fends off an all-out attack by unknown life forms. Become an EDF soldier, battle against endless hordes of immense enemies, and restore peace to the earth.

reviewHighlights.text: Come get the full experience of living in Australia without being robbed by meth heads! I blew up the city to stop the aliens from blowing up the city...
